HomePage.description1: The Headpat Community is an online social media community. We voluntarily offer our members a platform for connecting, exchanging and expressing.
HomePage.description2: This includes our Discord server, our Telegram group, the Minecraft server (Pawcraft), an online portfolio (headpat.place), an app, a social media con planner, a VR map, online and offline events and much more!

MainMetadata.title: Headpat Community
MainMetadata.description: The Headpat Community is an online social media community. We voluntarily offer our members a platform for connecting, exchanging and expressing.

AccountMetadata.title: Account
AccountMetadata.description: The account page is where you can manage your account settings.

GalleryMetadata.title: Gallery
GalleryMetadata.description: Do you want to see cute pictures? Then you're in the right place!
